metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16787 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2019-19905. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2019-19905. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2019-19905 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

notes.Note: sbeattie> Duplicate of CVE-2019-19905, need MITRE to decide

criterions.comment: nethack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
